ProductServiceCampaignItemStatus.name: ProductServiceCampaignItemStatus
ProductServiceCampaignItemStatus.description: Represents a status for a product service campaign item in field service.

ApiName.description: The API name of the status value.

IsDefault.description: Indicates that the status value is the default status on product service campaign items when true. Only one status value can be the default.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the picklist value in the UI.

SortOrder.description: The valueâ€™s position in the dropdown list in the UI.

StatusCode.description: The status category that the value corresponds to. The Status Category field has seven values that are identical to the default Status values.
